item.description:

if (playerCommand.equals("pots")) { c.getItems().addItem(2442, 1); c.getItems().addItem(2436, 1); c.getItems().addItem(2440, 1); c.getItems().addItem(2434, 2); c.sendMessage("<shad=10906535>Donate to get overloadz."); }

how would i make this for when donator do this they get overloadz and people who are not donators get pots
